humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is 1 positive lymph node out of 35 assessed lymph nodes (1/35) in the right axilla. Based on the new rules provided, this corresponds to N1 stage, as metastases are found in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has one positive lymph node out of 34 examined (1/34, or 1/23 from level I and 1/11 from intramammary), which corresponds to N1 stage. The report does not mention extranodal extension, so we can ignore that part of the N1 criteria. The patient does not meet the criteria for N0, N2, or N3, as there is only one positive lym ethod='plaintext'>The N stage from this report is N1. The patient has one positive lymph node out of 34 examined (1/34, or 1/23 from level I and 1/11 from intramammary), which corresponds to N1 stage. The report does not mention extranodal extension, so we can ignore that part of the N1 criteria. The patient does not meet the criteria for N0, N2, or N3, as there is only one positive lymph node and no other factors (like matted or in-transit nodes) are present.
